overview: A look at the lives of  several struggling L.A. musicians. Gwen, a singer-songwriter, is on a quest for the big-time. Working as an assistant to a film production designer, Gwen tries to steal her boss' boyfriend, a veteran rock producer. The producer, meanwhile, is trying to orchestrate a comeback for an '80s band.
cast: Jade Gordon|John Taylor|Michael Des Barres|Martin Kemp|Larry Klein
